# Flow Cytometer Files PreProcessing using R

It is important to note that this tutorial is written based on settings on the `guavava` flow cytometer armed with the `lynCyte` software. Also the settings on the cytometer is specially tuned for counting and sorting cyanobacteria cells. While the tutorial might not be directly applicable to other instruments and settings, the general idea is applicable and the ensuring codes could be easily adapted.
